summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 KIT COMPANION RV.  THE VEHICLE HAS A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR, MODEL RM2652.  THE CONTACT NOTICED A YELLOWISH RESIDUE COMING FROM THE REFRIGERATOR, WHICH INDICATED THAT IT WAS LEAKING AMMONIA.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 08E032000 (EQUIPMENT).  SHE IMMEDIATELY CALLED DOMETIC AND WAS INFORMED THAT BECAUSE THE VEHICLE EXCEEDED ITS WARRANTY, SHE WOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE REPAIR COSTS.  THE FAILURE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE NOT APPLICABLE. UPDATED 09/24/08.  *LJ  UPDATED 10/01/08. *JB
